chinese: 马阿姨给邓大叔讲她一天的工作。
english: Aunt Ma tells Uncle Deng about her day's work.

chinese: 网友们给邓大叔和马阿姨点赞。
english: Netizens gave likes to Uncle Deng and Aunt Ma.

chinese: 邓大叔给马阿姨帮忙打扫卫生。
english: Uncle Deng helps Aunt Ma clean.

chinese: 这个视频给很多人带来了感动。
english: This video brought a lot of people to tears.

chinese: 邓大叔下班后给马阿姨送晚餐。
english: Uncle Deng brings dinner to Aunt Ma after work.
